title: What's the difference between '系统' and '制度'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both could translate as “system” in English 系统 is same as the English word ‘system’, but Chinese prefer to use this in engineering, biology, technology, computer，mathematics etc. For example, 生态系统（eco system）， 安卓系统（Android OS），消化系统（digestive system）. However, is also okay to mean a social system. For example, 教育系统 医疗系统 （教育制度 医疗制度 are also right） When you use 系统 or 系统的 as an adjective, it means “methodic”. 系统学习。 系统研究。 制度 is only used in social science field. It means “Institution”. And 制度 is somehow more official. For example, 社会制度，我们公司的制度，法律制度，地方制度（地方 means local），“一国两制”制度 etc

Both of them in English in some contexts can be translated as “system”, but the meaning of the“system” conferred by the word 系统 should be understood as “a set of principles, beliefs, etc.; a scheme, a method”; while the meaning of “system” conferred by 制度 should be understood as “an organized or connected group of things”.
